comments:
20020919
1. Go to the extensions page of an existing plugin and look at a properties of 
a contributed element.
eg. org.eclipse.jdt.ui, perspective, Java (perspective).
2. In the properties select the icon, browse (...)
3. A checked tree dialog is presented
   Select a non-gif file
4. In the Extensions page, check 'Show full extension hierarchy'
 -> SWTException

- The checked tree selection dialog is strange for a single selection
- Only images should be shown

We should shield ourselves from errors, not only exceptions in this case.

Fixed.
The only files shown in the new dialog are ones with image formats that are 
supported by SWT's image loader, e.g. bmp, gif, png, jpeg, and ico.
Plus, the new dialog supports single selection only, as one would expect.
